name: The Gap Band
description: '''The Gap Band''' was an American [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] and [[funk]] band that rose to fame during the 1970s and 1980s. The band consisted of three brothers: [[Charlie Wilson (musician)|Charlie]], Ronnie, and Robert Wilson, along with other members; it was named after streets (Greenwood, Archer, and Pine) in the historic [[Greenwood, Tulsa|Greenwood]] neighborhood in the brothers' hometown of [[Tulsa, Oklahoma]].
